Add comprehensive GBA design documentation and templates

- Added complete design.md with feature ID system, git worktree support, and enhanced state tracking

- Added design comparison and improvements documentation
- Updated all Cargo.toml files to use claude-agent-sdk-rs 0.6
- Added rust-toolchain.toml for Rust 2024 edition support
- Created CLAUDE.md with project coding standards
- Added template review checklist and verification documents

All templates reviewed and verified against checklist:
- Clear instructions for AI agents
- Correct variable usage
- Resume handling in all phase templates
- No unnecessary complexity
- Production-ready quality

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(codex --full-auto exec "Review the code in crates/ and apps/ directories against the design specification. 

Context: This is a GBA \(Geektime Bootcamp Agent\) project implementing a CLI tool that wraps Claude Agent SDK.

Focus areas:
1. API design matches the spec in specs/design.md
2. Error handling follows CLAUDE.md guidelines \(thiserror for libraries, anyhow for apps, no unwrap/expect\)
3. Async patterns are correct \(tokio runtime, channels, proper error handling\)
4. Code organization follows the design \(gba-core, gba-pm, gba-cli structure\)

For each issue found provide:
- Location: File path and line number
- Severity: Critical / High / Medium / Low / Info
- Category: Bug / Security / Performance / Style / Documentation
- Description: Clear explanation
- Suggestion: How to fix

Review these specific files:
- crates/gba-core/src/lib.rs
- crates/gba-core/src/state.rs
- crates/gba-pm/src/lib.rs
- apps/gba-cli/src/main.rs
- apps/gba-cli/src/commands/*.rs

Organize findings by severity.")

Bash(codex --full-auto exec "Review the GBA \(Geektime Bootcamp Agent\) implementation against the design specification in specs/design.md.

Focus on these key requirements:

## 1. gba-pm \(Prompt Manager\) - crates/gba-pm/src/lib.rs
Check if it implements:
- PromptManager with minijinja template engine
- PromptContext for template rendering
- TaskConfig for loading config.yml
- Template caching with parking_lot::RwLock
- Custom filters: slugify, indent
- Custom functions: read_file, list_files
- load_phase_prompts for system.md and user.md

## 2. gba-core \(Core Engine\) - crates/gba-core/src/lib.rs
Check if it implements:
- AgentRunner with Claude Agent SDK integration
- ExecutionRequest, ExecutionResult, ExecutionContext types
- FeatureState management \(state.yml\)
- Actor-based execution model with tokio
- Phase execution logic
- Streaming output support
- Error handling and retry logic

## 3. gba-cli \(CLI Application\) - apps/gba-cli/src/main.rs
Check if it implements:
- init command \(create .gba structure\)
- plan command \(interactive planning with ratatui\)
- run command \(execute phases with progress UI\)
- Git worktree support
- Resume functionality

Provide a structured review with:
- Compliance status for each requirement
- Missing features or gaps
- Code quality issues
- Security concerns
- Recommendations for improvement

Format as a detailed review report.")

Bash(codex --full-auto -o /tmp/review.md exec "Perform a code review of the Rust codebase. Check:
1. Error handling - should use thiserror for libraries, no unwrap/expect
2. Async patterns - tokio usage, proper error handling
3. API design - public interfaces should be clean and documented
4. Code quality - follow Rust best practices

Review files in crates/gba-core/src/, crates/gba-pm/src/, and apps/gba-cli/src/

Output a structured review with severity levels.")
